name: @panic-system/infrastructure
description: CloudFormation scripts to create/manage the overarching infrastructure resources

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run prepare:variables:dev && npm run sls -- deploy --stage development
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run prepare:variables:staging && npm run sls -- deploy --stage staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run prepare:variables:prod && npm run sls -- deploy --stage production
scripts.localstack:start: docker pull localstack/localstack:latest && docker run --rm -itd -p 4566:4566 -p 4571:4571 --name panic-system-localstack localstack/localstack && sleep 10 && aws s3api create-bucket --bucket infrastructure --endpoint http://localhost:4566 --region us-east-1
scripts.localstack:restart: npm run localstack:destroy && npm run localstack:start
scripts.remove:dev: npm run prepare:variables:dev && npm run sls -- remove --stage development
scripts.remove:staging: npm run prepare:variables:staging && npm run sls -- remove --stage staging
scripts.remove:prod: npm run prepare:variables:prod && npm run sls -- remove --stage production

author: Gavin van Gent
